title: Sleep do not disturb (from 23.00 to 08.00) deactivated randomly after midnight, any idea?
content:
Sleep do not disturb is set from 23.00 to 08.00, it activates correctly at 23.00 but it randomly deactivates itself after midnight.

I have this problem since the october security patch I think. Any idea?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a XL
